flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
It seductivelynwiggles its hipsnas it walks. Itfcan cause peoplento dance innunison with it.
It seductivelynwiggles its hipsnas it walks. Itfcan cause peoplento dance innunison with it.
Appears to movento a rhythm ofnits own, as if itfwere dancing. Itnwiggles its hipsnas it walks.
It rocks its bodynrhythmically. Itnappears to alterfthe rhythm depend­ning on how it isnfeeling.
It speaks a lan­nguage similar tonthat of humans.fHowever, it seemsnto use dancing toncommunicate.
It has severalndifferent cry pat­nterns, each offwhich seems tonhave its ownnmeaning.

JYNX walks rhythmically, swaying andnshaking its hips as if it were dancing.nIts motions are so bouncingly alluring,fpeople seeing it are compelled to shakentheir hips without giving any thoughtnto what they are doing.

JYNX walks rhythmically, swaying andnshaking its hips as if it were dancing.nIts motions are so bouncingly alluring,fpeople seeing it are compelled to shakentheir hips without giving any thoughtnto what they are doing.
A JYNX sashays rhythmically as if it werendancing. Its motions are so bouncinglynalluring, people seeing it are compelled tonshake their hips without noticing.
It speaks using a language that soundsnhuman. Research is under way to determinenwhat is being said.
It seductively wiggles its hips as itnwalks. It can cause people to dance innunison with it.
Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
It rocks its body rhythmically.nIt appears to alter the rhythmndepending on how it is feeling.
It speaks a language similar tonthat of humans. However, it seemsnto use dancing to communicate.
Son cri ressemble à des parolesnhumaines. Mais nul n’est jamaisnparvenu à les comprendre.
Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
Son cri ressemble à des parolesnhumaines. Mais nul n’est jamaisnparvenu à les comprendre.
Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
Its cries sound like human speech.nHowever, it is impossible to tellnwhat it is trying to say.
こしを　ふるように　あるいている。nゆだんをすると　おもわず　つられてnおどってしまうという。
허리를 흔드는 듯이 걷고 있다.n방심하면 엉겁결에 따라서n춤춰버린다고 한다.
Il ondule ses hanches en marchant et entraîne lesngens dans des danses frénétiques.
Der beschwingte Gang dieses Pokémon bezaubertnZuschauer und lässt sie im Takt dazu tanzen.
Camina moviendo las caderas de forma llamativa.nPuede hacer que la gente baile a su ritmo.
Camminando ancheggia in modo seducente.nLa gente può essere indotta a seguire la sua danza.
It wiggles its hips as it walks. It canncause people to dance in unison with it.
腰を　振るように　歩いている。n油断をすると　思わず　釣られてn踊ってしまうという。
にんげんのような　ことばを　はなすがnまだ　なにをいっているか　ふめいでnげんざい　けんきゅうされている。
인간처럼 말을 하지만n아직 무슨 말을 하는지 알 수 없어n현재 연구 중이다.
Il communique en utilisant un langage qui semblenêtre humain. Des recherches sont en cours pourndéterminer ce qu’il dit.
Es spricht und benutzt dabei eine Sprache, die derndes Menschen sehr ähnelt. Noch wird erforscht,nwas es wirklich spricht.
Habla emitiendo sonidos que parecen humanos. Senestá intentando descifrar lo que dice cuando habla.
Parla usando un linguaggio simile a quello umano.nSono in corso studi per riuscire a interpretarlo.
It speaks using a language that sounds human.nResearch is under way to determine what isnbeing said.
人間のような　言葉を　話すがnまだ　なにを言っているか　不明でn現在　研究されている。
おどるような　こしつきで　リズミカルに　あるく。nその　うごきは　みている　ひとも　おもわずnこしを　ふってしまうほど　かろやかなのだ。
춤추는 듯한 자세로 리드미컬하게 걷는다.n그 움직임은 보고 있는 사람마저 얼떨결에n허리를 흔들 정도로 경쾌하다.

Lippoutou marche en rythme, ondule de tout son corps etnse déhanche comme s’il dansait. Ses mouvements sont sincommunicatifs que les gens qui le voient sont soudain prisnd’une terrible envie de bouger les hanches, sans réfléchir.

Rossana bewegt sich rhythmisch fort. Es wiegt und schwingtnseine Hüften, als würde es tanzen. Seine Bewegungen wirkennso anziehend auf Menschen, dass diese beginnen, mit dennHüften zu schwingen, ohne darüber nachzudenken.
Jynx camina con ritmo, balanceándose y moviendo las caderasncomo si estuviera bailando. Realiza unos movimientos tannvistosos y atractivos que no hay quien pueda resistirse anmover las caderas.

Jynx avanza oscillando e ancheggiando ritmicamente comenin una specie di danza tesa ad ammaliare il nemico.nChi vede questo Pokémon è costretto a iniziare la stessandanza senza pensare a cosa sta facendo.

Jynx walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if itnwere dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, peoplenseeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving anynthought to what they are doing.
踊るような　腰つきで　リズミカルに　歩く。nその　動きは　見ている　人も　思わずn腰を　振ってしまうほど　軽やかなのだ。
おどるような　こしつきで　リズミカルに　あるく。nその　うごきは　みている　ひとも　おもわずnこしを　ふってしまうほど　かろやかなのだ。
춤추는 듯한 자세로 리드미컬하게 걷는다.n그 움직임은 보고 있는 사람마저 얼떨결에n허리를 흔들 정도로 경쾌하다.

Lippoutou marche en rythme, ondule de tout son corps etnse déhanche comme s’il dansait. Ses mouvements sont sincommunicatifs que les gens qui le voient sont soudain prisnd’une terrible envie de bouger les hanches, sans réfléchir.

Rossana bewegt sich rhythmisch fort. Es wiegt und schwingtnseine Hüften, als würde es tanzen. Seine Bewegungen wirkennso anziehend auf Menschen, dass diese beginnen, mit dennHüften zu schwingen, ohne darüber nachzudenken.
Jynx camina con ritmo, balanceándose y moviendo las caderasncomo si estuviera bailando. Realiza unos movimientos tannvistosos y atractivos que no hay quien pueda resistirse anmover las caderas.

Jynx avanza oscillando e ancheggiando ritmicamente comenin una specie di danza tesa ad ammaliare il nemico.nChi vede questo Pokémon è costretto a iniziare la stessandanza senza pensare a cosa sta facendo.

Jynx walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hipsnas if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring,npeople seeing it are compelled to shake their hips withoutngiving any thought to what they are doing.
踊るような　腰つきで　リズミカルに　歩く。nその　動きは　見ている　人も　思わずn腰を　振ってしまうほど　軽やかなのだ。
どくとくの　リズムで　こしを　ふる。nアローラに　すむ　ルージュラはnそのキレが　じつに　すばらしい。
독특한 리듬으로 허리를 흔든다.n알로라에 사는 루주라는n그 동작이 실로 훌륭하다.
會以獨特的節奏扭動腰部。n棲息在阿羅拉的迷唇姐n動作更是特別完美無瑕。
Les Lippoutou se déhanchent sur un tempo trèsnparticulier, et ceux d’Alola sont particulièrementnréputés pour leur admirable sens du rythme.
Es bewegt seine Hüften in einem eigentümlichennRhythmus. Rossana in Alola beherrschen einennbesonders anmutigen Hüftschwung.
Se bambolea con un ritmo peculiar que, en elncaso de los ejemplares que viven en Alola, esnrealmente cautivador.
Cammina ancheggiando a un ritmo tutto suo.nI movimenti dei Jynx della regione di Alola sononparticolarmente affascinanti.
It sways its hips to a rhythm all its own. Thenprecise movements of Jynx living in Alola arentruly wonderful.
独特の　リズムで　腰を　振る。nアローラに　棲む　ルージュラはnそのキレが　実に　素晴らしい。
会按独特的节奏扭动腰部。n栖息在阿罗拉的迷唇姐，n那动作更是妙不可言。
にんげんの　ことばのような　ふしぎなnなきごえ。　ルージュラに　うたわせるnきょくを　つくる　おんがくかもいる。
인간의 언어를 닮은 이상한n울음소리를 가졌다. 루주라가 부르는n곡을 만드는 음악가도 있다.
奇異的叫聲聽起來就像是n人類的語言。也有些音樂家n會創作讓迷唇姐唱的曲子。
Ses étranges cris s’apparentent à des mots.nCertains musiciens lui composent des chansonsnpour qu’il les interprète.
Sein sonderbarer Ruf klingt fast wie die Sprachender Menschen. Manche Musiker schreiben sogarneigens Lieder, damit Rossana sie singen kann.
Sus particulares gritos recuerdan al lenguajenhumano. Algunos artistas han compuesto temasnespecíficamente para estos Pokémon.
Emette strani versi che ricordano il linguaggionumano. Alcuni compositori scrivono melodienappositamente per farle cantare ai Jynx.
Its strange cries sound like human language.nThere are some musicians who compose songsnfor Jynx to sing.
人間の　言葉のような　不思議なn鳴き声。　ルージュラに　歌わせるn曲を　作る　音楽家もいる。
神奇的叫声听起来就像人类的n语言一样。也有些音乐家n会谱写一些让迷唇姐唱的曲子。
どくとくの　リズムを　もつらしくnおどるように　かろやかに　うごきnこしをふる　ようにして　あるく。
특유의 리듬감을 갖고 있다.n춤추듯 경쾌하게 움직이며n허리를 흔들며 걷는다.
似乎有著獨特的節奏感。n會以跳舞般的輕快動作n扭著腰來走路。
Ce Pokémon bouge en rythme commens’il dansait. Il ondule même du popotinnquand il marche.
Es scheint sich mit einem besonderen Rhythmusnzu bewegen. Beim Laufen schwingt es die Hüftennund sieht so aus, als würde es tanzen.
Parece moverse como si estuviera bailando unnritmo de su propia invención. Mueve mucho lasncaderas al andar.
Si muove in modo leggiadro, come sendanzasse seguendo un ritmo tutto suo.nCammina ancheggiando.
Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if itnwere dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.
独特の　リズムを　もつらしくn踊るように　軽やかに　動きn腰を振る　ようにして　歩く。
以独特的节奏悠然移动，n仿佛是在跳舞。走路的n姿势如同在扭腰一样。
どくとくの　リズムを　もつらしくnおどるように　かろやかに　うごきnこしをふる　ようにして　あるく。
